title: Tender API
description:
The API allows you to define what tenders should be available in a given store
and their respective behaviour, such as currency id, description,
tender restriction rules for for specific item category etc.

Tender.description:
Tender includes all the forms of payment that are accepted by the retail store
in settling sales and other transactions.

id.description:
A code which uniquely identifies the tender.
It is also the ID referenced to identify the tender in the POSLog
(i.e. the transaction data from POS).

currencyId.description: A identifier for the currency. Usually the three letter ISO 4217 code.

classCode.description:
The group of tenders to which this tender type belongs. Can be
Cash, Check, CreditDebit, ForeignCurrency, GiftCertificate, OrganizationCharge,\
ElectronicGiftCard, LoyaltyRedemption, Voucher, Coupon, FoodStamp, HouseAccount,\
WICCheck, ManufacturerCoupon

additionalProperties.description: Additional custom properties can be added via this field.

AdditionalProperty.description: Contains key-value collection of additional property.

id.description: A unique id for additional property object.

value.description: The actual Value of the additional property object.

dataType.description: The type of the data found in 'value'.

RestrictionRule.description: A rule that is set on a Tender to specify which items can be purchased with this tender.

name.description: A name for this restriction rule.

description.description: A description for this restriction rule.

maxAllowedAmount.description: The maximum amount that can be used at one purchase with the tender that references this rule.

minAllowedAmount.description: The minimum amount that can be used at one purchase with the tender that references this rule.

itemCategoryTags.description: A list of item category tags.

ItemCategoryTag.description: Item category tags are used to mark certain items that can be paid for with specific tenders.

name.description: The name of the item category tag.
